title: Chroma Skins not showing [Client]
body:
In champion select, my vayne chroma skins are not showing and can not pick them.
Play -> Normals -> Champion Select -> Picks Vayne -> Goes on skins -> Dragonslayer -> no chroma skins :(
This issue occurs occasionally. Screenshot attached.

https://gyazo.com/83a94c1e80af1f42f1004d0bb9c08282

replies.body:
Hiya, 

Thanks for the report, and for adding a screenshot (makes things a lot easier). It looks like the chroma pack UI didn't load in (we'd had a similar issue with ward skin select). This is somehing we've been trying to track down, but it appears it's a weird scenario of loading in the client that doesn't have a 100% repro. Just to confirm, you aren't experiencing this every time you're loading into game attempting to use that chroma pack, correct?

Actually, I have the same problem he does. At least for me, I am experiencing this for all of my chromas ever time I try to load into a game. It doesn't work for Dynamic, Blind pick, and doesn't work for me in custom games as well. This is every time that I try to load into the game.
Thanks for the additional context - I can follow up with the team today about it. :)
I thank you for your concern. Glad to see Rioters that care about us.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Of course! :) (This is also something in regards to the content I work on, so it's a bit easier to investigate!)
